mapper.select: SELECT article.id article_id, article.collection_id, article.content, article.title, article.create_time article_create_time, coll.name collection_name, ur.id user_id,ur.username, ur.head_url FROM T_BLOG_ARTICLE article LEFT JOIN T_BLOG_COLLECTION coll ON article.collection_id = coll.id LEFT JOIN T_BLOG_USER ur ON coll.user_id = ur.id WHERE article.id = #{articleId}
